article.text: Our reporter, Bora Bayraktar asked him whether, after a lull of more than a year, a new process in the six-party talks was now underway. According to Jalili, the sanctions imposed on Tehran are having a negative impact on Europe as well as Iran. According to Jalili, it is ordinary Europeans who are paying the price through thousands of lost job opportunities. Copyright © 2012 euronews Western powers say they are cautiously optimistic after the first talks with Iran over its nuclear programme in more than a year.
